title: Low Attendance in CIE
content:
hi I'm a 2nd year / sem 4 student 

If have an attendance of 70% in CIE , will i still get my esa hall pass?

comments.body: Last sem they let it pass but asked students to write a letter , god knows what they will do this sem
Last time they just gave everyone 100 attendance lol at the end I'm hoping they would do same this sem.
Nah those mfs are calling ppl tm to attend in the CEI Room in EC Campus. They sent a google form link and I cant even access it.
